name: Frog Island
description:
Rescue the frog to the island - or don't - it's up to you. Beware of the battle ship - or don't - it cannot harm you.

Control helicopter with mouse.

Submitted the the 8 Bits to Infinity Mash Up Jam.

Based on "The Aviator" by Codrops.

https://tympanus.net/codrops/2016/04/26/the-aviator-animating-basic-3d-scene-threejs/
